category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 20 (Human Rights Management System and Procedure)
contents: Article 20 (Human Rights Management System and Procedure) In order to practice human rights management, the chairman shall establish necessary systems and procedures, such as a human rights management department, human rights management committee, human rights practice and inspection obligations, human rights impact assessment, and human rights violation relief system. [Moved from Article 19, previous Article 20 moved to Article 17 2019. 11. 7.]
